title: Severe High MS/ping on game mode Hexakill
body: hi is anyone else getting really high ping/ms in game mode Hexakill i will spike up to 500 Ms and when it dose this i cant move my  champion please send this to the top im not the only one having this issue

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing some nasty bursts of packet loss and high latency spikes. These are often caused by either local network settings or ISP routing issues before the server. A great starting point is to ensure your local settings are up to par with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those settings caused any change in your connection.
